Irish: Cad é na teangacha atá agat?
Cad é na teangacha eile atá agat?
English: Which/what other languages can you speak?

Irish: Tá Iodáilis agam ach níl aon Spáinnis agam.
English: I speak Italian but I can't speak Spanish.

Irish: Níl aon Fraincis nó Spáinnis agam.
English: I speak neither french nor Spanish.

Irish: If you tell someone that you are learning a language, you might be asked where:
